description: Strengthen the capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation strengthened
subproject.description:
Output 1: Capacity of civil society enhanced to establish itself as a sustainable sector and a force for reconciliation in Cypriot society
Output 2: Public Awareness Campaign designed and delivered on the role of Civil Society
Output 3: Follow up study/assessment on the state of Cypriot Civil Society
Output 4: Monitoring and Evaluation programme developed.
subproject.title: ENGAGE

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation strengthened
subproject.description:
Indicators: 
1. No. of recommendations from the action plan adopted by the respective authorities
2. Raised awareness among young people of their role as peace builders (to be measured by surveys)

Expected Outputs:
1.	Opportunities for dialogue among youth increased
2.	Public awareness on youth participation raised 
3.	Youth workers empowered
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: YOUTH ACTIVISM

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation strengthened
subproject.description:
Outputs:
1) CSO Consortium established and committed among the founding members 
2) Community Media Centre established and operational
3) Video and audio output produced and broadcast
Indicators:
4) Media skills training packages tailored for CSO’s developed and implemented.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation strengthened
subproject.description:
Outcome:Policy options supporting reconciliation expanded through informed public discourse and evidence-based research
Indicator:Conclusions from polling and Cyprus 2015 research discussed by the leadership and wider public.

Output 1:BETTER INFORMED PUBLIC ENGAGED IN RECONCILIATION EFFORTS
Output 2: KEY ACTORS WORKING TOGETHER TO CREATE AN INCLUSIVE ENVIRONMENT FOR RECONCILIATION
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: CYPRUS 2015

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation strengthened
subproject.description:

Output 2:
Capacity of local stakeholders developed to integrate participatory principles into their own work and share the knowledge with others. 
Output 3: Participatory development best practices shared locally and in the region

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation strengthened
subproject.description:
OUTPUT 1:  Current economic interdependence between the two communities assessed and recommendations for reinforced economic convergence produced 
OUTPUT 2: Framework for a joint economic development strategy developed (a macro-level strategy but with a focus on the role of the business sector)
OUTPUT 3: Bi-communal business partnerships established 
OUTPUT 4: Public awareness campaign on the benefits of economic interdependence implemented
subproject.title: INTERDEPENDENCE
